info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 2:31AM PST until December 26 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For today`s Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For Sunday`s Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Rough lake conditions on Pyramid Lake with wave heights of 1 to 2 feet today, increasing to 2 to 4 feet on Sunday. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties and Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM PST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 8 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous boating conditions on Pyramid Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated gusts in excess of 60 mph cannot be ruled out in wind prone areas on Sunday.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.
